creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the artist
description: white glazed wheel thrown jar with small, flat opening at top; interior and top lip of jar are glazed black; jar is narrow at bottom and top, tapering into wide, flat sides; white glaze contains specks of other colors including brown, grey, and a prominent green spot
medium: Stoneware with white and matte black glaze
signed: bottom of jar, in marker, in Japanese
title: White jar
